name: Vegan Parmesan

instructions.action: Add Brazil nuts and cashews to a food processor or high-speed blender
Add nutritional yeast, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper
Pulse in short bursts until mixture resembles grated parmesan cheese
Stop before it becomes nut butter - you want a fine, granular texture
Taste and adjust seasonings as needed

tips: Don't over-process or it will turn into nut butter
Pulse in short bursts for best control
Store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks
Can be frozen for up to 3 months
Sprinkle on pasta, pizza, salads, popcorn
Nutritional yeast gives it a cheesy flavor
Can use only Brazil nuts for even more selenium
